downloadTitle: Viva Holistic Listening Vision & Strategy Discovery Workbook
downloadDescription: Use this workbook to design your holistic employee listening strategy with Microsoft Viva.
detailsSection: In order to build your holistic employee listening strategy and design a program that reflects the needs of your organization, you should take some time to align with internal stakeholders and complete this workbook as a team. This workbook will help you better articulate the critical business information that will be important to consider alongside your listening strategy. You will also be able to track progress on your goals over time in this document.
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it.
